Class SlotsController

java.lang.Object
com.example.mycasinofx.controllers.games.slots.SlotsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class SlotsController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for managing the UI of the SlotsController game page.

      public void setLabelsResult(ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> generalArrayCopy, int finishIndex1, int finishIndex2, int finishIndex3)
      Sets the result labels for the slots.
      Parameters:
      generalArrayCopy - The copy of the general array containing slot numbers.
      finishIndex1 - The index of the first slot result.
      finishIndex2 - The index of the second slot result.
      finishIndex3 - The index of the third slot result.
